alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 21 at 1:25AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN VENTURA COUNTY THROUGH 230 AM PST... At 123 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a very strong storm cell near Oxnard, moving northeast at 30 mph. This storm has a slight chance of producing a weak tornado. HAZARD...Possible weak tornadoes, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, torrential rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxnard... Ventura... Camarillo... Santa Paula... Port Hueneme... Ventura Harbor... Naval Base Ventura County... Silver Strand Beach... and El Rio. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
